TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDeploymentConflictCollection implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentConflict>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 每个 表示 SharePoint 项目项所部署的项与 SharePoint 站点上的项之间的冲突。

span.span: Each represents a conflict between items being deployed by a SharePoint project item and items on the SharePoint site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象属性。An object is returned by the property. 如果您决定部署冲突存在 SharePoint 项目项部署时，请使用方法以通知此冲突的 Visual Studio，并指定 Visual Studio 将调用来解决冲突的方法。If you determine that a deployment conflict exists when a SharePoint project item is being deployed, use the method to notify Visual Studio of the conflict and to specify the method that Visual Studio will call to resolve the conflict. 方法将返回对象，表示新的部署冲突。The method returns an object that represents the new deployment conflict. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 处理部署冲突](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-handle-deployment-conflicts)。For an example, see [How to: Handle Deployment Conflicts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-handle-deployment-conflicts).

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.IDeploymentConflict Add (string description, Func<Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem,bool> resolve, bool promptBeforeResolve);

span.span: The description of the deployment conflict.

param.name: resolve

span.span: A delegate that can resolve the conflict.

span.span: The delegate must have a Boolean return value and a single parameter of type .

param.name: promptBeforeResolve
param.span: 如果在执行 resolve 委托之前应提示用户，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 将新的 对象添加到此集合中。

span.span: Adds a new object to this collection.

returns.span: 表示部署冲突的新对象。

span.span: A new object that represents the deployment conflict.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关示例，演示如何创建对象以处理部署冲突，请参见[如何： 处理部署冲突](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-handle-deployment-conflicts)。For an example that demonstrates how to create an object to handle a deployment conflict, see [How to: Handle Deployment Conflicts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-handle-deployment-conflicts).
